User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the FriendsNavigator application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity (matches Firebase Auth UID).

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

Trip.title: Trip
Trip.description: Represents a trip within the FriendsNavigator application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Trip entity.

description.description: An optional description for the trip.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who created the trip.

participantIds.description: An array of user UIDs who are part of this trip.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Represents a user's live location for a specific trip.

lat.description: The latitude of the user's location.

lng.description: The longitude of the user's location.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last location update.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Only the user themselves can write to it. Other participants of a shared trip can read it.
Stores core information about a trip. Participants can read/write.
Stores the live location of a specific user for a given trip. Only the user can update their own location. Other trip participants can read it.
